mil3.3.12:2.2_1: nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ,
mil3.3.12:2.3_1: yañca puriso cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.4_0: Yañca sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.5_0: Yañca ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.6_0: Yañca jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
mil3.3.12:2.7_0: Yañca kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti,
mil3.3.12:2.7_1: yañca manasā dhammaṁ vijānāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
